TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Construction of 2 roundabout and reconstruction of the part of the street Proleterski Brigadi

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Construction of 2 roundabout and reconstruction of the part of the street Proleterski Brigadi

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — statement that within the last 5 years, the economic operator has not had a legally ef pronounced against him/her for participation in a criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— certificate that the economic operator is not subject to a bankruptcy procedure,
— certificate that the economic operator is not subject to a liquidation procedure,
— certificate that the economic operator has paid taxes, contributions, and other public dues from a competent.
Authority in the country where the economic operator is registered;

— certificate from the Register of penalties for committed crimes to legal entities that the economic operator has not been pronounced with a minor penalty prohibiting the participation in public procedures, public procurement contract awarding and public-private partnership contracts;

— certificate from the Register of penalties for committed crimes to legal entities that the economic operator has not been pronounced with a minor penalty for temporary or permanent prohibition for performing of a certain activity, and

— certificate that with an effective decree (adjudication) the economic operator has not been pronounced with a misdemeanor sanction – prohibition to perform a profession, activity or duty perform a certain activity.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: The Contracting Authority shall use the electronic auction as the final phase in the open procedure. The subject of the auction is the total price of the public contract subject, that is, the lowest price out of the acceptable.
Tenders submitted in the initial phase of the procedure. The request for participation at the auction shall be.

Electronically delivered through the ESPP following the complete evaluation of the initial tenders, to all economic operators who have submitted acceptable tenders in the first phase of the procedure. Following the complete evaluation of the initial tenders and the approval of the initial ranking list, an automatic notification shall be sent through the ESPP to the registered e-mail address of each economic operator who is not qualified for participation at the electronic auction, whereas the qualified tenderers for participation at the auction shall be directly submitted with a Request for participation at the auction. The request for participation at the auction shall contain the following data:
— initial auction price, that is the lowest price of the initially submitted tenders;
— date and hour of commencement and closing of the auction;
— the interval within which the negative bidding shall.

Be carried out (minimal and maximal difference in offered prices); as well as the current rank of the tenderer made on the basis of the initially submitted price. The reached total price at the electronic auction, including all costs and discounts, VAT excluded, for the contract subject, shall involve proportional reduction of prices for each position of the public procurement contract subject. The auction will be conducted on the single price excluded with calculated discount, meaning that the real discount will be in the part of the profit of the bidders.

After the completion of the auction, the reduction that has been achieved (in percentage) will be calculated on the price (new if meantime the prices have been changed by the Energy Regulatory Commission).
